title: Book Cover, "Bookjacket by Alvin Lustig for "Monday Night" by Kay Boyle, New Directions Books", 1947
medium: Lithography in black, blue and grey ink on off-white shiny wove paper
signed: Printed in black ink, front cover upper right: lustig.
inscribed:
Printed vertically in black ink, spine: MONDAY NIGHT KAY BOYLE; printed horizontally in black ink, spine lower margin within square: NC 20.

Printed in white ink, front cover lower center left: monday night; printed in black ink, front cover lower right: kay boyle.
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Bookjacket design. Design on off-white ground with blue and gray stippling which forms cloud forms on cover. Cover features, on lower right, black bottle with thin neck and flat, rectangular lip. On bottle is white scull and crossbones in which skull is upsidedown triange and bones are two white lines. Behind, starting at upper center, extending most of page is thin black spiral.

tombstone.epitaph:
Book Cover, "Bookjacket by Alvin Lustig for "Monday Night" by Kay Boyle, New Directions Books", 1947.
1947. Lithography in black, blue and grey ink on off-white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-165-9.
